caption.p: ( a) Linear relationship between hatching date and SIC (n = 303, R² = 0.08, p < 0.001, y = 16.7 + 0.15x), ( b) Linear relationship between chick growth rate and SIC (n = 252, R² = 0.03, p = 0.007, y = −0.037x + 6.79), ( c) Linear relationship between chick growth rate and summer mercury contamination (n = 165, R² = 0.03, p = 0.02, y = – 0.66x + 7.2).
